item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk warned them three years ago. Today the German government is finally admitting he was right...
item.description: Elon Musk warned them three years ago. Today the German government is finally admitting he was right Chancellor Friedrich Merz has officially labeled the decision to shut down Germany’s nuclear plants a 'huge mistake,' confessing that the move has crippled the economy and left the country with the most expensive energy transition in the world (What Elon warned 3 years ago:) I think it's very important that Germany not shut down its nuclear power stations? I think this is extremely crazy I want to be super clear. My opinion is Germany should not only not shut down the nuclear power plants, it should reopen the ones that shut down. Those are the fastest ones to restart. It's crazy to shut down nuclear power plants Especially if you're in a place where there are no natural disasters. If you're somewhere with severe earthquakes or tsunamis, it's more of a question mark But if there's not a massive natural disaster risk which Germany does not have then there's really no danger with the nuclear power plants

item.title: @elonmusk: The Democrat open borders plan to entrench single party rule, explained in under two minutes 1. Floo...
item.description: The Democrat open borders plan to entrench single party rule, explained in under two minutes 1. Flood the country with untold millions of illegals by land, sea, and air from all over the world. Enough to eclipse the populations of 36 individual US states so far 2. Prioritize the needs of these millions of non-citizens over the needs of the American citizen, with free flights, buses, hotels, meals and phones, ensuring their loyalty to the political party that imported them 3. Keep them in the country at all costs, even when they commit violent crime like murder and rape. Attack the language used to describe the criminals, as opposed to the criminals themselves. Slander critics as racist 4. Ensure their privileges are made irrevocable with city and state sanctuary laws that act as population magnets. Codify permanent status and ensure non-cooperation with ICE 5. Count the non-citizens in the census that will determine congressional apportionment in the House of Representatives. As of now, that would equal 13 extra congressional districts a tremendous amount of electoral power 6. Wage a massive, heavily funded lawfare campaign to change state voting laws that legalize mass mail-in ballots, no signature verification, and no proof of citizenship requirements, making it nearly impossible to prove voter fraud 7. Lock in the permanent voting majority with campaign promises of lavish benefits and permanent privileges, enshrining generational fealty to the Democrat Party 8. Win elections 9. Entrenched single-party rule has been achieved The best part? Your tax dollars are paying for it

item.title: @elonmusk: incredible. video prompt: Cosmic hums and ethereal whispers. No background music. Ethereal movements...
item.description: incredible. video prompt: Cosmic hums and ethereal whispers. No background music. Ethereal movements for the figure, physically correct for the human. Slow motion. Volumetric lighting. Bokeh glow. Motion blur on flowing elements. The figure's starry tendrils undulate and shimmer in gentle succession, extending outward rhythmically. The human approaches slowly with lantern swinging, casting flickering reflections. Figure tilts head downward gracefully. Dynamic camerawork with smooth tracking and orbit shot circling the encounter at varying angles. She reaches refracting starlight in waves.

item.title: @elonmusk: To be clear, I think we should only waive the filibuster to pass an election integrity act into law,...
item.description: To be clear, I think we should only waive the filibuster to pass an election integrity act into law, but not for any other reason. Election integrity must include visual ID that proves citizenship and in-person voting (except in extreme circumstances like troops overseas).

item.title: @elonmusk: How long & complicated can the deportation process be? Remember this Haitian gang member w/ 17 convi...
item.description: How long & complicated can the deportation process be? Remember this Haitian gang member w/ 17 convictions who went viral for yelling “Fuck Trump, Biden forever” during my embed with ICE Boston 1 year ago? He’s still in ICE custody in the US. Despite having a deportation order, I’m told he continues to use every legal avenue & appeal to try to avoid deportation. He is currently detained by ICE at a facility in Louisiana. We witnessed him get arrested by ICE in Boston on 1/22/25.

item.title: @elonmusk: Nick Shirley interviews a January 6th political prisoner arrested by Democrats for protesting the st...
item.description: Nick Shirley interviews a January 6th political prisoner arrested by Democrats for protesting the stolen 2020 election He says he was put in solitary confinement for 2 year straight 23 hours a day he was locked in his cell. Sometimes for as long as 36 hours straight….

item.title: @elonmusk: MS-13 Illegals Just Hacked a 14-Year-Old to Death in Maryland: To the activists and politicians chan...
item.description: MS-13 Illegals Just Hacked a 14-Year-Old to Death in Maryland: To the activists and politicians chanting “abolish ICE” — do this one thing: Look the 14-year-old’s mother in the face and say it. Say you don’t support the agency that exists to deport violent criminals before innocent lives are taken. Four illegal aliens connected to MS-13 were arrested in Maryland after allegedly hacking a 14-year-old boy to d*ath with a machete. This isn’t political theory. This isn’t rhetoric. This is a child who will never come home and a mother left to bury her son. This is why we stand with ICE. So violent criminals are removed before they destroy families. So tragedies like this don’t happen.
